thread.title: Gilbert Arenas loves the Matt Barnes-Derek Fisher scandal
thread.title_full: Gilbert Arenas loves the Matt Barnes-Derek Fisher scandal - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Gilbert Arenas loves the Matt Barnes-Derek Fisher scandal
text:
NICK WASS/AP Ex-NBA star Gilbert Arenas knows what it's like to be caught up in a nasty breakup. Gilbert Arenas is really enjoying the “Basketball Wives” spinoff starring Derek Fisher and Matt Barnes .
The former NBA star is so engaged by the love triangle between the Knicks coach, Grizzlies forward and his estranged wife that he returned to social media Thursday and began mocking the pair, using viral videos to hammer home his points .
BARNES ON FISHER: 'WE WERE GOOD FRIENDS AT ONE POINT'
“(T)hey said #Dfish was running out the house from @matt_barnes9 like he had warrants and matt was the police #donttouchme,” Arenas posted to Instagram along with a photo of a naked man being chased by cops. “hahahaha i love both these guys..thats why its funnier to me....”
